about_the_game:
About game streaming

You are welcome to livestream and upload videos of the game.
Monetization through streaming is also allowed.
There is no need to seek permission for the above.
Please feel free to enjoy and have fun with it.
If you could include the store URL in your streaming description, we would greatly appreciate it.

About this game

This is a maritime adventure game where you explore the world map by ship, discovering and collecting ports, ancient ruins, and animals from around the world. It's a game that allows you to enjoy collecting real ports, famous ruins, and unique animals.

Journey through the decaying world of 2048. A time for exploration and discovery.
The quest begins to reclaim the lost world maps.

Embark as a sailor, charting maps while uncovering ports around the world.
A world reminiscent of the real Earth, yet with a medieval touch, where monsters roam and you navigate by ship.

Transport trade goods from ports to different continents, accumulate wealth, defeat monsters for the sake of the people, and uncover valuable ruins and creatures to explore the world.

It is not possible to transfer the save data from the trial version to the full version.

Use GamePad:
Movement/Cursor Movement: Left Stick
Targeting: Right Stick
Confirm/Select: South Button (e.g., A on Xbox controller)
Close-Range Attack: Left/Right Shoulder Buttons (e.g., LB/RB on Xbox controller)
Long-Range Attack: Left/Right Trigger Buttons (e.g., LT/RT on Xbox controller)
Menu: East Button (e.g., B on Xbox controller)
Mini-map Toggle: West Button (e.g., X on Xbox controller)



Use keyboard and mouse:
Movement/Cursor Movement: WASD
Targeting: Mouse
Confirm/Select: Enter
Close-Range Attack: Left Mouse Button
Long-Range Attack: Right Mouse Button
Menu: N
Mini-map Toggle: M
City Information: Y

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 3
  • Processor: Zen 2 4c/8t、2.4-3.5GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 RDNA 2 CU、1.6GHz
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS 3
  • Processor: Zen 2 4c/8t、2.4-3.5GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 RDNA 2 CU、1.6GHz
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Sonoma 14.2.1
  • Processor: Apple M1またはIntel Corei5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple Sillicon M1 または Radeon Pro 555
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Sonoma 14.2.1
  • Processor: Apple M1またはIntel Corei5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple Sillicon M1 または Radeon Pro 555
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Ocean Explorer Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-4350
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 570, 1 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7850, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64 ビットプロセッサとオペレーティングシステムが必要です
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-4350
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760, 2 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64 ビットプロセッサとオペレーティングシステムが必要です
